data.name: Chromosome Evil - New Weapon & Weapons customatization
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is dedicated to all the fans that supported our game, your feedback & support not only made us motivated to work on the first DLC but also made it financially possible to release it for free.

What does it contain?

- NEW WEAPON CUSTOMIZATION INTERFACE: yes we heard you, we noticed many of you want more customization for the equipment so now you will be able to choose the mod the weapons with scopes, barrels, and so on + it will also change the visual avatar of weapons.
- NEW ARMOUR UPGRADE SYSTEM: yes, we heard you again, we now added a system that lets you have more control over the armor upgrade system.
- NEW BALLANCE: because of the newly implemented systems we also had to adjust a large portion of the game balance to fit with the new additions.
- NEW WEAPON/ FLAME THROWER: we received many suggestions during the private Beta test for a flame thrower and we promised we will add it after the release. Mission accomplished.
- ABILITY TO CHANGE WEAPONS: yes we noticed that a huge amount of you wanted the ability to change weapons so we added it along with a new system for unlocking them. The weapons & mood schematics drop randomly on weapon crates and will immediately unlock them in the weapon crafting menu.
- VISIBLE STATS: we now display some of the basic stats for each item in the Weapon/Armor menus, again this is based on the feedback we got although the main aim was to have players concentrate more on the tactical decision not the numbers and that is why we preferred to make the DLC based on your feedback separated from the main game initial concept, which brings me now to the warnings section:


WARNINGS:
- The DLC new system does not support the main game saves and the other way around
- The future UPDATES will be based on the new DLC system
- We did not change the initial inventory system from the main game build because many still enjoy that too


Thank you, players!
